description: Variation of Conditions 1 (Approved Plans) and 17 (Carbon Dioxide Emissions) of planning permission reference 19/6647/FUL dated 22/01/2021 for 'Demolition of the existing building, and construction of a part 3, part 4 storey building, comprising 21 residential dwellings with associated cycle parking, amenity space, communal landscaping, refuse and recycling storage.' Variation to include, Introduction of gate to ground floor plant room; Introduction of a stepped parapet; Reconfiguration of the internal layouts; Alterations to windows; Introduction of emergency use external staircase and external walkway on level 1 to the South elevation; Replacement of the window on the first and second floor to AOV window; Mailboxes have been introduced to the East Elevation; A lift overrun, smoke shaft, AOV, access ladders and RWPs have been demonstrated in the elevation drawings; Fixed purge panels, behind fixed louvres, were introduced to flats G.03, 1.03, 2.03;  Amendment to the energy strategy; PV panels layout has been updated; The refuse store positioned adjacent to the existing refuse store at 14 Friern Park and changes to the wording of condition 17 by insertion of target to achieve 54% Improvement in CO2 over Building regulations compliant baseline
decision_conditions: Deed of Variation to s106 on 19/6647/FUL
